column3: this place is a nice place to spend the day in nature, lots of greenery and its a great place for a walk.

Didn't know there was a nature center until I drove to South El Monte High School's swap meet and was looking for a place to park. Nature center has informative places for kids to check out. Also went out for a hike in the local area where it led to the bike path.

column2: A nice and quiet place to visit
column3: There is a short 1/4 mile Tim Bulmer Memorial Trail. There is a bike hiking trail next to it. It is a short half hours walk. Boarding San Gabriel River which currently is dry out due to the weather condition.
